Recent High Pressure (HP) 57 Fe Mössbauer studies [2] detected the onset of Fe 2+ species at around 23 GPa. For this to occur one must assume Fe 3+ -Cu 1+ bands overlap in which part of the Cu 1+ K Cu 2+ transition takes place. The obtained XAFS results indeed concurred with the Mössbauer ones, namely, changes have been observed in both the TM cations at pressures at which Fe 3+ -Fe 2+ occurs.
